statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Santa Clara hangs on for 70-63 win over Loyola Marymount
article.headline: Santa Clara hangs on for 70-63 win over Loyola Marymount
article.linkText: Santa Clara hangs on for 70-63 win over Loyola Marymount
article.story: LOS ANGELES -- Jared Brownridge scored 28 points, including six 3-pointers, and Santa Clara hung on Saturday for a 70-63 win over Loyola Marymount that snapped a six-game skid. Denzel Johnson added 13 points and Brandon Clark and Jarvis Pugh had 10 apiece as Santa Clara (12-16, 6-10 West Coast) nearly blew a 17-point lead but went 5 of 6 from the line over the final 36 seconds to clinch the win. The Broncos opened with a 19-5 run that included four of Brownridge's 3-pointers and carried a 35-21 advantage into the break. Loyola Marymount steadily chipped away in the second half, using an 8-0 burst in the final minute that included a 3-pointer from Matt Hayes and five points from Godwin Okonji to cut it to 65-63 with 50 seconds to play. The Lions missed their final three shots. Hayes led LMU with 20 points, David Humphries added 16 and Okonji 15.
